class Defaults[source]

Defaults()

Helps keep a DRY principle across this project. The split ratio was defined based on information found on Roboflow. self.trainer_template is pulled from the YOLOv5 tutorial.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
print("\n".join(["Define defaults:"]+[f"  * {x}" for x in Defaults().__dict__.keys()]))

Define defaults:
  * root
  * split_ratio
  * data_yaml
  * resource_map
  * trainer_template
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

prepare_YOLOv5[source]

prepare_YOLOv5()

  • Clone repository if the YOLOv5 directory does not exist.
  • Install requirements.txt
  • Check that GPU is enabled.
